snippet.title: Toy Story: Disney's Animated Storybook - Full Gameplay/Walkthrough (Longplay)
snippet.description:
Take a trip to infinity and beyond with Woody, Buzz Lightyear, and the rest of the Toy Story gang! With engaging animations, interactive storytelling, and creative activities, this game is a fantastic way to bring the magic of Pixar to your child's screen.

 - About this game: 

Toy Story: Animated StoryBook is a 1996 Disney Interactive storybook offering young readers a chance to improve their reading comprehension, vocabulary, and problem-solving skills. Players can participate in activities, sing-alongs, and learn how to use a dictionary.

Toy Story: Animated StoryBook is a CD-ROM adventure where you bring the story to life. With the click of a mouse, you'll enter a wacky 3-D world where toys come alive. As you read along, it's up to you to help Woody and Buzz escape bad-boy Sid, catch the moving van, and become best buddies. Every page is packed with fun surprises, plus music and 3-D graphics just like the movie. In fact, there's plenty of new animation for a nonstop reading adventure worth getting all wound up about!

------------------------------

Watch more of this!

Read to Me: https://youtu.be/wDUMSeQ1-eQ

Part 1: https://youtu.be/6ZePraaNva0
Part 2: https://youtu.be/PCOYd36BLiA
Part 3: https://youtu.be/lgJ8JyIid8A
Part 4: https://youtu.be/tZtSvmamK_I
Part 5: https://youtu.be/59GY1hWFy3g
Part 6: https://youtu.be/gXnU7_qLTAA
Part 7: https://youtu.be/OUCT4juh6sk
Part 8: https://youtu.be/er6oCMs0Cnc
Part 9: https://youtu.be/OlzHGg6Octk

Longplay: https://youtu.be/imzl0KN1SNE

------------------------
